column2: _order_a_big_pizza;True;"User: I would like to order a big pizza. Is that okay?

column1: Assistant: Could you please tell me what toppings you would like on your big pizza?"

column4: I want corn and mushrooms on the pizza. Is that good?

column1: Assistant: Great choice! A big pizza with corn

column4: I want to order a drink now. Can I get a Sprite?

column2: your big pizza order with corn
column3: mushrooms and ham and sprite is on its way."
